prompts: okay this is my user level claude code configuration folder (~/.claude/). search the web to see if we can turn this folder into a github repository without messing anything up. if so, turn this folder into a git repo

great! Now i want you to go to ~/ and then find this repo: ~/claude-code-hooks-mastery/ . I want you to then create this directory: ~/cc-resources/ and move the hook repo to this directory like this: ~/cc-resources/claude-code-hooks-mastery/
